sentences.en: even Laurence finally &B{lost patience with} him.
sentences.cn: 即使是劳伦斯最后也对他发了脾气。

sentences.en: Everyone admired her patience and unfailing good humour.
sentences.cn: 人人都佩服她的耐心和永不衰减的好脾气。

sentences.en: Given patience, successful breeding of this species can be achieved.
sentences.cn: 只要有耐心，是能成功培育出这一品种的。

sentences.en: He doesn't have the patience to wait.
He had little patience for fuzzy ideas.
sentences.cn: 他没什么耐心听那些糊里糊涂的想法。

sentences.en: He has a sense of humour plus tolerance and patience.
sentences.cn: 他具有幽默感又能宽容和忍耐.

sentences.en: He has little patience for sloppy work from colleagues.
sentences.cn: 他对同事们草草敷衍的工作鲜有耐心。

sentences.en: He tended to stutter, which tried her patience.
sentences.cn: 他老结巴，这叫她难以忍受。

sentences.en: He would often sit and play patience.
sentences.cn: 他常常坐着玩单人纸牌游戏。

sentences.en: His energy was unbounded and his patience inexhaustible.
sentences.cn: 他有无穷的精力和无限的耐心。

sentences.en: I feel that she would try the patience of a saint.
sentences.cn: 我觉得圣人都能被她逼疯。

sentences.en: I've had enough—there are limits even for the patience of a saint!
sentences.cn: 我已经受够了——即使是圣人忍耐也是有限的！

sentences.en: It was exacting work and required all his patience.
sentences.cn: 工作很艰巨，需要他有极大的耐心。

sentences.en: Non-violence and patience are the central tenets of their faith.
sentences.cn: 非暴力和忍耐是他们的信仰的核心原则。

sentences.en: We eventually ran out of patience with his childish behaviour.
sentences.cn: 我们终于对他幼稚的行为忍无可忍.

sentences.en: We would like to thank them for their patience and understanding.
sentences.cn: 我们要感谢他们的耐心和理解。

sentences.en: You'll have little patience with the hypocrisy and double standards you encounter.
sentences.cn: 你将会无法忍受所遭遇的伪善和双重标准。

trans.tran_cn: 容忍，毅力，单人纸牌游戏
trans.tran_en: If you have patience, you are able to stay calm and not get annoyed, for example, when something takes a long time, or when someone is not doing what you want them to do
